name: CyteShoppe
tag_list: web-design, development, internet-hosting, copy-writing, programming, web-app-design
overview:
CyteShoppe, a Brooklyn, NY based company, is a leading designer and developer of complete Internet solutions.

Services include Web site design, custom application development, database architectures, and multimedia presentations.

Additionally, CyteShoppe provides complementary services such as Web site hosting, copy writing, translation, and system administration.

The companyâ€™s goal is to assist businesses and organizations to improve their revenue potential through intelligent technology implementation. In order to achieve this objective, CyteShoppe takes on the burden of technology issues while allowing a business to concentrate in their own field.

The tradition of quality, service and value guided even the very first Web project.
